entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 30%
